flavor_text: When two BELDUM fuse together METANG is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are joined by a magnetic nervous system.By linking its brains magnetically this Pokemon generates strong psychokinetic power.
When two BELDUM fuse together METANG is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are joined by a magnetic nervous system.This Pokemon turns its arms to the rear for traveling at high speed.
The claws tipping its arms pack the destructive power to tear through thick iron sheets as if they were silk. It flies at over 60 miles per hour.
It floats midair using magnetism. Its body is so tough even a crash with a jet plane won't leave a scratch.
